name: Pollen Count
description:
Pollen Count is a casual 2D clicker / idle game about growing flowers.

  • Click the flowers to grow them and collect pollen.
  • Buy Plant Food, Sun Lamps, Super Soil and Pollinators to earn more pollen and grow plants more quickly.
  • Climb through the gardener ranks from the lowly "Sprout" rank to "Green God", and eventually retire to complete the game!
  • Supported on mobile and desktop (some mobile device resolutions may be incompatible)

(If the viewport size is incorrect, try using the full screen option).

Pollen Count was created in 3 days for the "Clicker Jam 2" game jam. I tried to condense the clicker game experience into a shorter time-frame; this game can be completed in 30-60 minutes.

Software Used: Construct 2, Adobe Photoshop, Logic Pro X
